DESCRIPTION.P: dragrect drags one or more rectangles anywhere on the screen. The 4xn matrix rect defines the rectangles. Each column of initial_rect must contain the initial rectangle position as [left;top;width;height] values. When a button is clicked dragrect returns the final rectangles definition in final_Rect.
